title: Actually Custom Custom Games?

embed.description: Either way, I still have to give a lot of love to Riot for making such a great game, these are just some changes that I'd love to see in the future!

body: So i was thinking, why doesn't Riot make a custom custom game where you can giver yourself xp, gold, ad, ap and so on. it should have pause, rewind and bots in it. i think this would be good to help my friends (who are newcomers) learn the game better so i can pause at their mistakes and rewind it telling them to try again. Also i could have plenty of fun with my friends, giving myself 1000 ad and ap and just trolling. the video above is like my point but has a few other. Worth checking out i guess.
